traits.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The jermlaine has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Vermin Friend
entries: The jermlaine can speak to and understand rats and giant rats.

traits.name: Swarming Rush
entries: A jermlaine adds {@dice 1d4} to its weapon damage rolls while within 5 feet of another, conscious jermlaine.

actions.name: Club
entries: Melee atk {@hit -1} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 1 (1d4 - 3 damage) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Dart
entries: Ranged atk +3 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. 3 (1d4 + 1 damage) piercing damage.
